titleStmt.title: The dignitie of Gods children. Or An exposition of 1. Iohn 3. 1.2.3 Plentifully shewing the comfortable, happie, and most blessed state of all Gods children, and also on the contrarie, the base, fearefull, and most wofull condition of all other that are not the children of God.
titleStmt.author: Stoughton, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Thomas Haueland, for Thomas Man, and are to be sold at his shop in Paternoster Row, at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: A variant (STC 23315, known from F.S. Ferguson notes only) has "Thomas Man the yonger" in imprint.
Imperfect: Ls copy, reel 2034, is missing pp. 416-417; reel 1220 copy faded, tightly bound.
Reproductions of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 1220) and Sion College Library, London, England (2034).

place.placeName: his shop in Paternoster Row, at the signe of the Talbot
